name: A Sentient Ooze
description:
A strange slime appears! 

Controls : Click spaces to grow your slime. May the best slime win.

Made during OGA Summer Jam 2022

Credits :

This game was created using art, including music and SFX, from the following OpenGameArt.org submissions; modifications were made.
